channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1556] Clean up whitespace in tika-server
item.description: We have 2- and 4-space indents in different parts of tika-server's code. Let's make consistent with rest of Tika.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
SUCCESS: Integrated in tika-trunk-jdk1.7 #500 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-trunk-jdk1.7/500/)
TIKA-1556 clean up whitespace in tika-server (tallison: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1661200)
